texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Fleet Auto Pay records the number of charging days a vehicle is driven within the Congestion Charge zone/Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ)."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Your business will be billed every month.
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Complete a Direct Debit mandate as part of your application","Supply certain documents about your company","Be over 18 to apply"]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["See all your statements online","Ask to have your statements emailed to you","Change your vehicle and payment details online at any time"]}
You'll need to provide us with 1 of the following:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eRegistered companies\u003c/strong\u003e - headed paper with your company number OR a copy of your company's Certificate of Incorporation (issued by Companies House or the equivalent within an EEA state)","\u003cstrong\u003ePublic organisations\u003c/strong\u003e - headed paper including organisation name (further proof may be needed for verification)","\u003cstrong\u003eCharities\u003c/strong\u003e - headed paper including organisation name and registered charity number"]}
